sentence: It appears Republicans plan to spend the most, $9.5 million, on Warnock, who could face Republican Herschel Walker (R) in the general election.
author: Hannah Bleau
title: NRSC to Drop $53 Million in TV Ads to Retake Senate Majority

sentence: Warnock, who won in a special election in 2021, is running for a full term of his own this year against former football star Herschel Walker, and former state House Minority Leader Stacey Abrams is trying to unseat Gov.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Campaign Report  Biden confronts his most serious midterm issue
